file.name: openapi.yaml
file.content:
openapi: 3.0.1 info: description: "Allows for Provisioning and Entitlement of FactSet accounts. \n \n\ \ Authentication is provided via FactSet's [API Key System](https://developer.factset.com/authentication)\n\ \ \n Please note that the on-page \"Try it out\" features do not function. You\ \ must authorize against our API and make requests directly againt the endpoints.\n\ \ \n " title: FactSet Procure to Pay API version: 1S servers: - url: https://api.factset.com/procuretopay/provisioning/ security: - FactSetApiKey: [] - FactSetOAuth2: [] tags: - description: Determine status of specific order by transactionCode name: Order Status - description: Create and manage individuals name: User Management - description: Manage individuals' entitlements name: Entitlement Management paths: /createIndividual: post: requestBody: content: application/json: schema: $ref: '#/components/schemas/createIndividual' responses: "202": content: application/json; charset=utf-8: schema: $ref: '#/components/schemas/inline_response_202' description: Accepted headers: X-DataDirect-Request-Key: description: FactSet's request key header. explode: false schema: type: string style: simple "400": description: Bad Request headers: X-DataDirect-Request-Key: description: FactSet's request key header. explode: false schema: type: string style: simple "401": description: Unauthenticated headers: X-DataDirect-Request-Key: description: FactSet's request key header. explode: false schema: type: string style: simple "403": description: Unauthorized headers: X-DataDirect-Request-Key: description: FactSet's request key header. explode: false schema: type: string style: simple "429": content: text/plain: example: Retry After X-Seconds schema: type: string description: Rate limit reached headers: X-DataDirect-Request-Key: description: FactSet's request key header. explode: false schema: type: string style: simple security: - basicAuth: [] servers: - url: https://api.factset.com/procuretopay/provisioning/ summary: Provisions an individual for FactSet tags: - User Management x-contentType: application/json x-accepts: application/json; charset=utf-8,text/plain /transactionStatus: get: parameters: - description: Transaction Code to query example: 7B27AA857B664F18AB4886A08A9A3D9C explode: true in: query name: transactioncode required: true schema: type: string style: form responses: "200": content: application/json; charset=utf-8: schema: $ref: '#/components/schemas/transactionStatus' description: OK headers: X-DataDirect-Request-Key: description: FactSet's request key header. explode: false schema: type: string style: simple "400": description: Bad Request headers: X-DataDirect-Request-Key: description: FactSet's request key header. explode: false schema: type: string style: simple "401": description: Unauthenticated headers: X-DataDirect-Request-Key: description: FactSet's request key header. explode: false schema: type: string style: simple "403": description: Unauthorized headers: X-DataDirect-Request-Key: description: FactSet's request key header. explode: false schema: type: string style: simple "404": content: application/json; charset=utf-8: schema: type: string description: Requested Resource not found headers: X-DataDirect-Request-Key: description: FactSet's request key header. explode: false schema: type: string style: simple "429": content: text/plain: example: Retry After X-Seconds schema: type: string description: Rate limit reached headers: X-DataDirect-Request-Key: description: FactSet's request key header. explode: false schema: type: string style: simple security: - basicAuth: [] servers: - url: https://api.factset.com/procuretopay/provisioning/ summary: Check status of order by transactionCode tags: - Order Status x-accepts: application/json; charset=utf-8,text/plain /modifyIndividual: post: requestBody: content: application/json: schema: $ref: '#/components/schemas/modifyIndividual' responses: "202": content: application/json; charset=utf-8: schema: $ref: '#/components/schemas/inline_response_202' description: Accepted headers: X-DataDirect-Request-Key: description: FactSet's request key header. explode: false schema: type: string style: simple "400": description: Bad Request headers: X-DataDirect-Request-Key: description: FactSet's request key header. explode: false schema: type: string style: simple "401": description: Unauthenticated headers: X-DataDirect-Request-Key: description: FactSet's request key header. explode: false schema: type: string style: simple "403": description: Unauthorized headers: X-DataDirect-Request-Key: description: FactSet's request key header. explode: false schema: type: string style: simple "429": content: text/plain: example: Retry After X-Seconds schema: type: string description: Rate limit reached headers: X-DataDirect-Request-Key: description: FactSet's request key header. explode: false schema: type: string style: simple security: - basicAuth: [] servers: - url: https://api.factset.com/procuretopay/provisioning/ summary: Modifies an individual's attributes as determined by the uniqueId in the body of the request. Please note that the uniqueId may not be changed. Fields not changing may be passed as NULL but never empty. tags: - User Management x-contentType: application/json x-accepts: application/json; charset=utf-8,text/plain /listIndividuals: get: parameters: - description:
Optional, if =TRUE will return additional product array per object with all productIds for all returned individuals.
example: true explode: true in: query name: includeProductIds required: false schema: type: boolean style: form responses: "200": content: application/json; charset=utf-8: schema: $ref: '#/components/schemas/listIndividuals' description: OK headers: X-DataDirect-Request-Key: description: FactSet's request key header. explode: false schema: type: string style: simple "400": description: Bad Request headers: X-DataDirect-Request-Key: description: FactSet's request key header. explode: false schema: type: string style: simple "401": description: Unauthenticated headers: X-DataDirect-Request-Key: description: FactSet's request key header. explode: false schema: type: string style: simple "403": description: Unauthorized headers: X-DataDirect-Request-Key: description: FactSet's request key header. explode: false schema: type: string style: simple "429": content: text/plain: example: Retry After X-Seconds schema: type: string description: Rate limit reached headers: X-DataDirect-Request-Key: description: FactSet's request key header. explode: false schema: type: string style: simple security: - basicAuth: [] servers: - url: https://api.factset.com/procuretopay/provisioning/ summary: Lists all individuals with details at all locations. tags: - User Management x-accepts: application/json; charset=utf-8,text/plain /getIndividual: get: parameters: - description: uniqueId to query example: jdoe113901 explode: true in: query name: uniqueid required: true schema: type: string style: form responses: "200": content: application/json; charset=utf-8: schema: $ref: '#/components/schemas/getIndividual' description: OK headers: X-DataDirect-Request-Key: description: FactSet's request key header. explode: false schema: type: string style: simple "400": description: Bad Request headers: X-DataDirect-Request-Key: description: FactSet's request key header. explode: false schema: type: string style: simple "401": description: Unauthenticated headers: X-DataDirect-Request-Key: description: FactSet's request key header. explode: false schema: type: string style: simple "403": description: Unauthorized headers: X-DataDirect-Request-Key: description: FactSet's request key header. explode: false schema: type: string style: simple "429": content: text/plain: example: Retry After X-Seconds schema: type: string description: Rate limit reached headers: X-DataDirect-Request-Key: description: FactSet's request key header. explode: false schema: type: string style: simple security: - basicAuth: [] servers: - url: https://api.factset.com/procuretopay/provisioning/ summary: Returns an individual's details by uniqueId tags: - User Management x-accepts: application/json; charset=utf-8,text/plain /cancelIndividual: post: requestBody: content: application/json: schema: $ref: '#/components/schemas/cancelIndividual' responses: "202": content: application/json; charset=utf-8: schema: $ref: '#/components/schemas/inline_response_202' description: Accepted headers: X-DataDirect-Request-Key: description: FactSet's request key header. explode: false schema: type: string style: simple "400": description: Bad Request headers: X-DataDirect-Request-Key: description: FactSet's request key header. explode: false schema: type: string style: simple "401": description: Unauthenticated headers: X-DataDirect-Request-Key: description: FactSet's request key header. explode: false schema: type: string style: simple "403": description: Unauthorized headers: X-DataDirect-Request-Key: description: FactSet's request key header. explode: false schema: type: string style: simple "429": content: text/plain: example: Retry After X-Seconds schema: type: string description: Rate limit reached headers: X-DataDirect-Request-Key: description: FactSet's request key header. explode: false schema: type: string style: simple security: - basicAuth: [] servers: - url: https://api.factset.com/procuretopay/provisioning/ summary: Cancels an individual's serial and all productIds tags: - User Management x-contentType: application/json x-accepts: application/json; charset=utf-8,text/plain /addProducts: post: requestBody: content: application/json: schema: $ref: '#/components/schemas/manageProductIds' responses: "202": content: application/json; charset=utf-8: schema: $ref: '#/components/schemas/inline_response_202' description: Accepted headers: X-DataDirect-Request-Key: description: FactSet's request key header. explode: false schema: type: string style: simple "400": description: Bad Request headers: X-DataDirect-Request-Key: description: FactSet's request key header. explode: false schema: type: string style: simple "401": description: Unauthenticated headers: X-DataDirect-Request-Key: description: FactSet's request key header. explode: false schema: type: string style: simple "403": description: Unauthorized headers: X-DataDirect-Request-Key: description: FactSet's request key header. explode: false schema: type: string style: simple "429": content: text/plain: example: Retry After X-Seconds schema: type: string description: Rate limit reached headers: X-DataDirect-Request-Key: description: FactSet's request key header. explode: false schema: type: string style: simple security: - basicAuth: [] servers: - url: https://api.factset.com/procuretopay/provisioning/ summary: Adds listed productIds to an individual tags: - Entitlement Management x-contentType: application/json x-accepts: application/json; charset=utf-8,text/plain /removeProducts: post: requestBody: content: application/json: schema: $ref: '#/components/schemas/manageProductIds' responses: "202": content: application/json; charset=utf-8: schema: $ref: '#/components/schemas/inline_response_202' description: Accepted headers: X-DataDirect-Request-Key: description: FactSet's request key header. explode: false schema: type: string style: simple "400": description: Bad Request headers: X-DataDirect-Request-Key: description: FactSet's request key header. explode: false schema: type: string style: simple "401": description: Unauthenticated headers: X-DataDirect-Request-Key: description: FactSet's request key header. explode: false schema: type: string style: simple "403": description: Unauthorized headers: X-DataDirect-Request-Key: description: FactSet's request key header. explode: false schema: type: string style: simple "429": content: text/plain: example: Retry After X-Seconds schema: type: string description: Rate limit reached headers: X-DataDirect-Request-Key: description: FactSet's request key header. explode: false schema: type: string style: simple security: - basicAuth: [] servers: - url: https://api.factset.com/procuretopay/provisioning/ summary: Removes listed productIds from an individual tags: - Entitlement Management x-contentType: application/json x-accepts: application/json; charset=utf-8,text/plain components: responses: AuthHeaders: description: FactSet's request key header headers: X-DataDirect-Request-Key: description: FactSet's request key header. explode: false schema: type: string style: simple throttleControl: content: text/plain: example: Retry After X-Seconds schema: type: string description: Rate limit reached headers: X-DataDirect-Request-Key: description: FactSet's request key header. explode: false schema: type: string style: simple "202Accepted": content: application/json; charset=utf-8: schema: $ref: '#/components/schemas/inline_response_202' description: Accepted headers: X-DataDirect-Request-Key: description: FactSet's request key header. explode: false schema: type: string style: simple "200Accepted": content: application/json; charset=utf-8: schema: properties: transactioncode: example: 492c81b9af7c4b0196e10061786a3594 type: string type: object description: OK headers: X-DataDirect-Request-Key: description: FactSet's request key header. explode: false schema: type: string style: simple "400BadRequest": description: Bad Request headers: X-DataDirect-Request-Key: description: FactSet's request key header. explode: false schema: type: string style: simple "401Unauthenticated": description: Unauthenticated headers: X-DataDirect-Request-Key: description: FactSet's request key header. explode: false schema: type: string style: simple "403Unauthorized": description: Unauthorized headers: X-DataDirect-Request-Key: description: FactSet's request key header. explode: false schema: type: string style: simple schemas: createIndividual: example: firstName: John lastName: Doe uniqueId: jdoe113901 roleId: "21" email: jdoe@acme.com assertionField: jdoe@acme.com locationId: "1" properties: firstName: format: nvarchar(250) type: string lastName: format: nvarchar(250) type: string uniqueId: description: A unique, constant reference to an individual/account. Used for Future management of individual. format: nvarchar(250) type: string roleId: format: nvarchar(250) type: string email: format: nvarchar(100) type: string assertionField: description: A unique value passed as nameId in the SAML response format: nvarchar(250) type: string locationId: description: Your reference to a physical location. format: nvarchar(250) type: string type: object transactionStatus: example: currentStatus: 2 message: "" username: SSO_000012UBP serialNumber: "12345" factsetId: john.doe@factset.net errorId: "" properties: currentStatus: format: int type: integer message: format: nvarchar(500) type: string username: format: nvarchar(20) type: string serialNumber: format: nvarchar(20) type: string factsetId: format: nvarchar(100) type: string errorId: format: int type: integer type: object modifyIndividual: example: firstName: John lastName: Doe uniqueID: jdoe113901 roleId: "21" email: jdoe@acme.com assertionfield: jdoe@acme.com locationId: "1" properties: firstName: format: nvarchar(250) type: string lastName: format: nvarchar(250) type: string uniqueId: format: nvarchar(250) type: string roleId: format: nvarchar(250) type: string email: format: nvarchar(100) type: string assertionField: format: nvarchar(250) type: string locationId: format: nvarchar(250) type: string type: object listIndividuals: example: - username: SSO_000012UBP serialNumber: "12345" factsetId: john.doe@factset.net productIds: - "123" - "456" - "789" firstName: John lastName: Doe uniqueId: jdoe113901 roleId: "21" email: jdoe@acme.com assertionField: jdoe@acme.com locationId: "1" - username: SSO_000012UBP serialNumber: "12346" factsetId: al.doe@factset.net productIds: - "123" - "456" - "1101" firstName: Al lastName: Doe uniqueId: adoe998621 roleId: "22" email: adoe@acme.com assertionField: adoe@acme.com locationId: "2" items: properties: firstName: format: nvarchar(250) type: string lastName: format: nvarchar(250) type: string uniqueId: format: nvarchar(250) type: string roleId: format: nvarchar(100) type: string serialNumber: format: nvarchar(20) type: string email: format: nvarchar(100) type: string assertionField: format: nvarchar(250) type: string locationId: format: nvarchar(250) type: string productIds: items: format: nvarchar(20) type: string type: array type: object type: array getIndividual: example: username: SSO_000012UBP serialNumber: "12345" factsetId: john.doe@factset.net productIds: - "123" - "456" - "789" firstName: John lastName: Doe uniqueId: jdoe113901 roleId: "21" email: jdoe@acme.com assertionField: jdoe@acme.com locationId: "1" properties: firstName: format: nvarchar(250) type: string lastName: format: nvarchar(250) type: string uniqueId: description: A constant reference to an individual/account format: nvarchar(250) type: string roleId: format: nvarchar(100) type: string serialNumber: format: nvarchar(20) type: string email: format: nvarchar(100) type: string assertionField: format: nvarchar(250) type: string locationId: description: Your reference to a physical location format: nvarchar(250) type: string productIds: items: format: nvarchar(20) type: string type: array type: object cancelIndividual: example: uniqueId: jdoe113901 properties: uniqueId: format: nvarchar(250) type: string type: object manageProductIds: example: uniqueId: jdoe113901 productIds: - "123" - "4379" - "103" properties: uniqueId: format: nvarchar(250) type: string productIds: items: format: nvarchar(20) type: string type: array type: object inline_response_202: example: transactioncode: 492c81b9af7c4b0196e10061786a3594 properties: transactioncode: example: 492c81b9af7c4b0196e10061786a3594 type: string type: object securitySchemes: FactSetOAuth2: flows: clientCredentials: scopes: {} tokenUrl: https://auth.factset.com/as/token.oauth2 type: oauth2 FactSetApiKey: scheme: basic type: http
